pages.text: $(li)Carrot on a Stick can be used to control saddled Pigs.$(br)$(li)A Carrot on a Stick can be crafted with a Fishing Rod and a Carrot.

$(li)To ride a Pig, first you have to equip a Saddle to the Pig.$(br)$(li)Then, right click to the Pig to ride it.$(br)$(li)Now, just hold the Carrot on a Stick on your hand to make walk your Pig in any direction.
